resources.string: How well-lit will your new plant\'s home be?
How much attention will you give your plant?
Would you like a large or small plant?
Will your plant hang or sit?

Soil: Well\-drained
Growth Rate: Moderate
Height: 0.1m
Spread: 0.3\-0.6m
Water Use: Low

Soil: Well\-Drained
Growth Rate: Slow
Height: Up to 6ft
Width: Up to 6ft
Water Use: High
Note: Mildly Toxic to Dogs and Cats

Soil: Acidic
Growth Rate: Fast
Height: 1.3m\-2m
Spread: 0.6m\-1.0m
Water Use: Moderate

Soil: Well\-Drained
Growth Rate: Fast
Height: 0.4\-0.7m
Spread: 0.3\-0.7m

Spread: 0.1\-0.3m

 Flowering: Aug.\-Oct.

Flowers: White, Yellow
Flowering: June\-August
Soil: loam soil
Growth Rate: Slow
Height: 2\-3m
Spread: 1\-1.5m
Water Use: Moderate
Fun Fact: Was considered a symbol of affluence in the Victorian Era

Flowers: White, Yellow
Flowering: April\-June

Spread: 1\-1.5m
Water Use: Low
Note: Best flowering results outdoors, but can be grown indoors too
Caution: Sap causes irritation
